p:
The method used to identify alkaloids was described by Aguoru et al.
16 The extracted leaf oil (0.2 g) was dissolved in 5 mL of 1% HCl and incubated in a water bath for approximately 2 minutes. The filtrate (1 mL) was treated with five drops of Dragendorff’s reagent. The formation of turbidity or an orange precipitate indicated the presence of alkaloids.
